description: Comfy for your passenger and convenient for you, The Spring stroller has all the amenities plus a new folding mechanism to make transport and storage a cinch. You can fold it with one hand. Simply lift the carry handle under the seat and the stroller collapses into a compact package that's easy load in your car. When on the go, smooth rolling wheels and padded seat keep the ride comfy. The weatherproof canopy has an expandable section with a mesh window, so you can check on your passenger. The mesh window even has a has a roll down cover, perfect for naptime. The reclining seat back has a peak-a-boo mesh window that uses silent magnetic closures, so there's no noisy hook-and-loop to wake your passenger.Collapsible design uses a single lever (doubles as an ergonomic carrying handle). When folded, the stroller locks closed and stands upright.One-hand adjustable handlebar height goes from 98–108cm, locking at any point in that range.UPF50+ canopy blocks UV and uses PFC-free weatherproof finishes.Adjustable canopy has an expandable mesh window for ventilation.Reclining seat lays nearly flat, great for naps on the go.Reclining seat back has a peak-a-boo mesh window with a silent magnetic closure.Padded 5-point harness.Swivelling front wheel for great handling in tight quarters. Front wheel can also be locked in place for smooth tracking when you have a bit more room.Puncture-proof, smooth rolling rubber tires.Front step helps kids hop in and out – just be sure the brakes are on.Under seat cargo basket holds more than 21L.In the box: Spring stroller, large front wheel, 2 rear wheels, removable canopy and documentation.
name: Thule Spring Stroller
